items.name: Bicycle Health
items.description: Bicycle Health provides confidential, effective, and timely treatments for opioid use disorders.

items.name: Biobot
items.description: Biobot is a wastewater intelligence platform, enabling healthcare workers, policy makers, and others to get accurate population-level data on disease, drugs, and chemicals in a community.

items.name: ESO Solutions
items.description: ESO Solutions is the largest provider of electronic health records and integrated software to emergency services. Additionally, the company owns the largest data set on health outcomes in emergency services in the United States.

items.name: Fleet Health
items.description: Fleet aims to create the largest and broadest clinical dataset in the world via a unique data integration engine, with an initial focus on public health.

items.name: General Medicine
items.partners: Matrix Partners, BoxGroup, Founder Collective, VXI Capital
items.description: General Medicine is building the one stop shop online storefront for effective and efficient medical care, giving patients agency and control over their care.

items.name: Grouper
items.description: Grouper is a platform to solve loneliness among the Medicare population by matching patients to clubs that engage them and reduce the likelihood of poor health outcomes.

items.name: Headlight
items.description: Headlight Health is a leading platform for online mental health therapy, leveraging cutting edge AI to drive efficiency and outcomes.

items.name: LinkMobile
items.description: LinkMobile is a mobile virtual network operator with a focus on Medicaid and Medicare patients. It provides phones and data plans to its target population as well as care coordination and patient outreach services.

items.name: Navina
items.description: Navina empowers clinicians to deliver personalized, proactive care with clinical insights they can trust, right in the moment of care.

items.name: Network Bio
items.description: Network Bio facilitates precision medicine through the creation of research-grade data assets in concert with healthcare institutions.

items.name: Nira Medical
items.description: Nira is building the future of neurological care, by bringin the country's top physicians together in a national practice platform.

items.name: OnMed
items.description: OnMed makes a clinic-in-a-box, with a commitment to improve the quality of life and sense of well-being in our communities by increasing access to healthcare, anywhere.

items.name: PartsSource
items.description: PartsSource is the premier marketplace for advanced hospital parts, modules, warranties, and service.

items.name: Rippl
items.description: Leveraging a value-based approach, disruptive technology, and a relentless focus on empowering and enabling its clinicians, Rippl is pioneering a new care model to dramatically expand access to high quality, wraparound behavioral healthcare for seniors, their families and caregivers.

items.name: Slope
items.description: Slope is a global provider of biospecimen lifecycle software, data, and services for complex clinical trials.

items.name: TigerConnect
items.description: TigerConnect is the modern communications platform for hospitals and healthcare.

items.name: Tuesday Health
items.description: Tuesday Health is transforming the path of serious and end-of-life illness through compassionate and personalized supportive care.

items.name: Xaira
items.partners: ARCH Venture Partners, Sequoia Capital, Foresite Capital, NEA, Lightspeed Venture Partners, Menlo Ventures, Lux Capital, SVAngel
items.description: Xaira is pioneering the discovery and development of life-changing medicines through the transformative power of artificial intelligence.

items.name: LifeStance
items.description: LifeStance is the largest provider of mental telehealth in the US.

items.name: Synfini
items.partners: Foothill Ventures, WERU INVESTMENT, Ferocity Capital, Trust Ventures
items.description: Synfini dramatically improves the quality and reduces the time and cost of translating drug targets, hits and virtual designs to physically validated small molecule drug candidates.

items.name: Connie Health
items.description: Connie Health is building the premiere Medicare navigation platform.
